entry.title: Tuesday: Rain showers or flurries. Temperature steady near plus 3.
entry.summary: Rain showers or flurries ending late this afternoon then mainly cloudy. Snowfall amount 2 cm inland. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 3. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 60%
